name: Eat Go Brrrrrr (Jam version)
description:
yay! i finished my first game jam

i really had fun making it and i hope you have fun playing it

i did not include windows mac or linux build bc the build didn't work

i included the source code for any curious person to modify stuff or for people to play without lag

(btw pls don't publish your changes to anywhere)

Controls: 

W A S D - moving

Shift - jumping

e - chomping

i recommend playing on Firefox
